Application fee will be $202) Source for tenants on Gumtree/Facebook for the DIY route, or go through a property agent3)Secure your tenants and sign the tenancy agreement contract4) Register your tenants with HDBRead more about the procedure her: https://www.hdb.gov.sg/cs/infoweb/residential/renting-out-a-flat-room/renting-out-your-flat/apply-for-approval0 comments0
